overview: The app has undergone a significant transformation from a simple counter app into a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. This transformation involved a complete overhaul of the app's features, UI, and architecture to accommodate the new functionality.
key_events: Removal of the existing counter feature
Implementation of a complete authentication flow with sliding transitions
Introduction of a Splash Screen showing a luxury car interior and chauffeur
Creation of a Welcome page with a 'Get Started' button and a luxury travel message
UI overhaul to reflect a dark theme luxury design
Architectural changes to support the new authentication flow and UI components
user_requests: User requested the transformation of the app into a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde
User requested the implementation of a comprehensive authentication flow with sliding transitions
User requested the removal of the existing counter feature
system_responses: System proposed a high-level plan to transform the app, including new features, modified features, removed features, architectural changes, and cross-cutting concerns

System provided a detailed summary of changes in the public interface, including architectural changes, component structure changes, method changes, dependency changes, breaking changes, potential impacts, and required updates
current_state: The app is now a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. It features a new authentication flow with a splash screen and welcome page, and a dark theme luxury design. The counter feature has been removed. The app's architecture has been updated to support the new features and UI components. Developers need to update any code that uses the removed or modified views, view models, methods, or dependencies, and implement the new authentication flow in their code.
